description:
The Arc’teryx Skaha Harness is a robust and breathable harness crafted for both single and multi-pitch rock climbing. It incorporates advanced features like Warp Strength Technology, a Spacermesh liner, four gear loops, and a convenient quick-release hook on the rear leg elastic.

  • The waist belt, known for its durability, flexibility, and comfort, is constructed from a 150-denier honeycomb warp knit mono mesh, complete with a Spacermesh™ liner to maximize breathability
  • The Warp Strength Technology™ (WST) reduces bulk and evenly distributes pressure from edge to edge, resulting in a more comfortable and ergonomic fit
  • The harness also boasts four gear loops, while its ergonomic swami, long rise, and wide, fixed leg loops enhance fit and hanging comfort
  • The continuous leg loop construction improves flexibility for better mobility and comfort during climbs. Moreover,
  • Quick-release hook on the rear leg elastic allows for quick pit-stops without the need to remove the harness
  • For added convenience and extended harness life, the leg loop elastic is replaceable, and a transport and storage bag is included
name: Arc'teryx Skaha Harness - Men's
